name: 8.8.1 - Non-fatal occupational injuries among employees, by sex and migrant status (per 100,000 employees) - SL_EMP_INJUR - Both sexes - No breakdown

source.additionalInfo:
Variable description: Non-fatal occupational injuries among employees, by sex and migrant status (per 100,000 employees) 
 
 Variable code: SL_EMP_INJUR 
 
 Metadata available at: https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/files/Metadata-08-08-01.pdf 
 
 Detailed sources: Source: ADM-IR - Insurance Records Source: ADM-LIR - Labour Inspectorate Records Source: ES - Labour-related Establishment Survey Source: ADM - Register of Work Accidents and Occupational Injuries Source: ADM-IR - National Data Standards for Injury Surveillance Records Source: ADM-IR - AUVA database Records from all insurance companies Source: Other - Statistical Report on Occupational Injuries Source: ADM-LIR - Labour Department Source: ADM-IR - Data submitted electronically by insurance companies Source: ADM-EBR - Social Security Board Records Source: ADM - Administrative reports Source: EC - Economic or Establishment Census Source: ADM-REO - National Work Injuries Statistics Program, (NWISP), Association of Workers' Compensation Boards of Canada (AWCBC).
